title: Deals: M1 iPad Pro now $199 off, official iPhone 13 leather cases $42, more
content:
All of Tuesday’s best Apple deals are now headlined by the best prices of the year on the latest 11-inch M1 iPad Pros. That’s alongside official iPhone 13/Pro/Max MagSafe Leather Cases from $42 and a sitewide Zagg Apple accessory 25% off sale. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: M1 iPad Pro now $199 off, official iPhone 13 leather cases $42, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: In today's best Apple deals, the latest M1 iPad Pro 11-inch models are down to the lowest prices of the year. Plus official iPhone 13 cases.
